setup_instructions: 1. Go to Google AI Studio: https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey
2. Sign in with your Google account
3. Click 'Create API Key' or 'Get API Key'
5. Replace the example API key above with your actual key
6. The extension will use Gemini Pro model by default
notes.api_key_format: Starts with 'AIza' followed by alphanumeric characters

rate_limits.note: Rate limits may vary based on your Google Cloud project settings

security_notes: Never commit actual API keys to version control
Regenerate your key if it's been exposed
Monitor your API usage in Google AI Studio
Set up usage quotas to prevent unexpected charges

troubleshooting.invalid_key: Verify the API key is copied correctly without extra spaces
troubleshooting.quota_exceeded: Check your quota limits in Google AI Studio
troubleshooting.region_restrictions: Some regions may have restricted access to Gemini API
